bibl.title: Galba and the Sullan Capitolium.
bibl.note: The American Numismatic Society possesses an apparently unique AE drachma struck at Alexandria under Galba. The reverse depicts the temple of Jupiter Optimus Maximus on the Capitoline Hill in Rome.
bibl.seg: Kleiner Fred S., Galba and the Sullan Capitolium.
The American Numismatic Society possesses an apparently unique AE drachma struck at Alexandria under Galba. The reverse depicts the temple of Jupiter Optimus Maximus on the Capitoline Hill in Rome.
